title: Time Machine (com.apple.MCX.TimeMachine)
description: The payload that configures Time Machine.

BackupDestURL.title: Backup Destination
BackupDestURL.description: The URL of the backup destination.

BackupAllVolumes.title: Backup all volumes
BackupAllVolumes.description: If 'true', backs up only the startup volume by default.

BackupSkipSys.title: Back up system files and folders
BackupSkipSys.description: If 'true', skips system files and folders by default.

AutoBackup.title: Enable automatic backups
AutoBackup.description: If 'true', performs automatic backups at regular intervals.

MobileBackups.title: Enable local snapshots
MobileBackups.description: If 'true', create local backup snapshots when not connected to the network.

BackupSizeMB.title: Backup size limit
BackupSizeMB.description: The backup size limit, in megabytes. Set to 0 for unlimited.

SkipPaths.title: Paths to skip
SkipPaths.description: The path to skip from start volume.

BasePaths.description: The list of paths to back up besides the startup volume.
